titles.title: STOP WEIRD Act of 2024
STOP WEIRD Act of 2024
Stopping Transgender Operation Payments and Wacky Expenses for Illegal Residents and Detainees Act of 2024

To prohibit Federal funds from being used to provide certain gender transition procedures to individuals in the custody of the Department of Homeland Security and the Department of Health and Human Services.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
